title: Style Scouting: Vol. 233
description: This post is from the blog, InMyOwnStyle.com Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. Hello… hello. I hope life is treating you well and you are looking forward to the week ahead… it is an exciting one... excerpt: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. Photo: Emily Followill Photography Hello... hello. I hope
text: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. Hello… hello. I hope life is treating you well and you are looking forward to the week ahead… it is an exciting one as the first day of spring arrives on Thursday. :-) This past past week was one that didn’t turn out as planned for me, hence the reason I didn’t get any new blog posts up. Hopefully this week I can dive back into the projects I recently started. For now I hope you enjoy the links I found for you with your favorite hot beverage in hand. Something to Think About How to worry less and start taking steps forward. (open in same tab) “The people whose first instinct is to smile when you make eye contact with them are some of Earth’s greatest treasures” – unknown If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here. And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more. Post navigation
html:
Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online.

Hello… hello. I hope life is treating you well and you are looking forward to the week ahead… it is an exciting one as the first day of spring arrives on Thursday. :-)

This past past week was one that didn’t turn out as planned for me, hence the reason I didn’t get any new blog posts up. Hopefully this week I can dive back into the projects I recently started.

For now I hope you enjoy the links I found for you with your favorite hot beverage in hand.

Something to Think About

How to worry less and start taking steps forward. (open in same tab)

“The people whose first instinct is to smile when you make eye contact with them are some of Earth’s greatest treasures” – unknown

If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here.

And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more.
